description:
Colgate Total Mint Stripe Antibacterial Toothpaste, is a fluoride, multi benefit toothpaste. Suitable for daily use and reduces bacteria on teeth, tongue, cheeks and gums.

For a healthy mouth, you need to take care of more than just teeth.

That’s why Colgate Total Mint Stripe antibacterial fluoride toothpaste proactively fights bacteria not just on your teeth, but also on your tongue, cheeks and gums for 12 hours* for whole mouth health.
*with 4 weeks of continuous use.

A Healthier You

Every day, we make it our mission to get you feeling your best - and we believe a healthy mouth makes a difference in being ready for what's ahead.
So we are truly excited that you've chosen us to help you step forward confidently into life, with a smile that's healthy as can be.

Colgate Total Whole Mouth Health Toothpaste helps to:

• Prevents cavities
• Remove plaque
• Protect enamel
• Prevent tartar buildup
• Freshen breath
• Whiten teeth
• Protect gums

No Colgate Toothpaste contains Sugar. Colgate Total toothpaste are also Vegan, Gluten Free and Responsibly Made*

Boxed contents: 1 Toothpaste
Size: 115g

WHOLE MOUTH HEALTH: Brushing with Colgate Total Toothpaste will help improve your teeth, tongue, cheeks and gum health.

STRONGER 12-HOUR BACTERIAL DEFENSE: Use Colgate Total Antibacterial Toothpaste for a stronger 12 hour bacterial defense (vs. ordinary non-antibacterial fluoride toothpastes, with 4 weeks of continued use)

MINT STRIPE: Colgate Total Antibacterial and Fluoride gel toothpaste in a Mint stripe flavour

CAVITY PROTECTION: Formula helps to remove plaque with brushing and prevents buildup of cavities and tartar

ADDITIONAL BENEFITS: Freshens breath, protects gums and enamel
name: Colgate Total Mint Stripe Gel Antibacterial Toothpaste 115g
